title: Roxoni Women's Slippers Cable Knit Super Cozy Comfort Clog
features: FEATURES: Roxoni Women’s Cable Knit fur lined Clogs are super comfy and are designed with an Ultra Comfort Fur Insole and a knitted outer. The embossed Non-Skid outsole provides an easy and safe walk with plenty of Support.

ANTI-SKID RUBBER SOLE: Get a grip and don’t slip! A lightweight design and anti-skid rubber sole provides traction so you can wear them anywhere. The non-skid rubber sole also makes them suitable for all types of indoor/outdoor surfaces.
HIGH-DENSITY MEMORY FOAM INSOLE: The slippers are lined with a high-density memory foam that molds to the foot and retains the shape ensuring maximum comfort.
COLOR AVAILABILITY: Available in three beautiful colors to suit every woman: Available in Black, Camel and Wine.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Satisfaction of our customers is our primary concern. If you are not happy with your purchase, feel free to contact us; we will do our best to meet your needs. We offer a 100% money back guarantee on our entire shoe collection, so that you can enjoy a risk-free purchase.
description: Roxoni presents a timeless classic Women’s Cable Knit Clog that will never go out of style!
The Slippers you’ve been dreaming about all season; ROXONI is here in countless colors and prints.

-Soft knitted upper, provides ultimate warmth. -Soft Fur lining, for maximum comfort.. -Multilayer memory foam insole, molds to the shape of the foot . -Versatile rubber sole, is durable & slip resistant to maintain your sturdy stride. -Slightly raised back, so your feet don’t slip out. -Easy care, machine washable. -Available in 3 classy colors, Black, Camel and Wine.
We take customer service seriously and want you to be 100% happy with your shopping experience. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions or comments, we will do our best to meet your needs.
